featured.text: In fact, they are one of the few tribes that have retained most of their traditions.
The color of the shúkà represented one’s importance in the tribe.

definition.zh_def: 部落；一群有共同文化、語言或血緣的人。
definition.en_def: A group of people, often related by blood or culture, who share a common identity.
definition.example: The tribe celebrated their annual festival with traditional music and dance.
